body.name: 30-LED Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Lights, Magnetic Rechargeable Under Counter Closet Light, Wireless Night Light Bar Stick-On, 2-Pack, Cool White

features: 【Tips】 1. Motion sensor mode can't be used during the day. Light up on motion detection ONLY in low ambient light. 2. The magnetic force on the stainless steel surface is not sufficient. You will need to use the provided metal strip for installation. 3. Please note that the input voltage of this product is DC 5V, please make sure the charger you use supports DC 5V output, otherwise the product cannot be charged.

【Upgraded Motion Sensor】When use AUTO mode, Our motion sensor light indoor can auto-on within the detection area (Range: 10ft, Angle: 120°), auto-off after 20 seconds of no motion detected, helps prolong working time. The PIR motion sensor can only be activated in dark environment. When use ON mode, this under cabinet lights rechargeable can be kept on, you can also use it for camping or blackout (instead of flashlight). 3 Switch Modes: Auto/ On /Off

【Easy Installation & Multiple Uses】 Built-in magnet, you can stick the led closet light motion activated to ironwork surface directly or via metal strip with non-marking tape; neither way will damage your precious furniture. Easy to install and remove it to charge. Ideal for closet, stairs, cabinet, wardrobe, bedside, drawers, cupboard, bookcase. When necessary, take the under cabinet lights wireless down for illumination at any time

【30 LEDs, 100lm, Eyes-Care】The closet lights motion sensored contains 30 LEDs, up to 100 lumens output. Offer you a gentle 6500K cool white light, bright enough to make sure you never stumble in the dark. Perfect to many space, like living room, bedroom, kitchen, washroom, car, garage, pantry, entrance, hallway, laundry room, baby rooms, attics

【USB Rechargeable】Built-in 1200 mAh high-capacity rechargeable battery, USB-C port can be easily fully charged in just 2 hours. After fully charged, these rechargeable under cabinet lighting last for 6 hours in ON mode and last up to 6 weeks in AUTO mode (Use 10 times per day) Charge occasionally but benefit daily

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A multi-purpose light for closet, stairs, cabinet, wardrobe, bedside, drawers, cupboard, bookcase.
When use AUTO mode, Our motion sensor light indoor can auto-on within the detection area (Range: 10ft, Angle: 120°), auto-off after 20 seconds of no motion detected, helps prolong working time.

Built-in 1200 mAh high-capacity rechargeable battery, USB-C port can be easily fully charged in just 2 hours. After fully charged, these rechargeable under cabinet lighting last for 6 hours in ON mode and last up to 6 weeks in AUTO mode (Use 10 times per day). Charge occasionally but benefit daily

More Features You May Wanna Know Previous page Next page

Here are warm tips for you: Motion sensor mode can't be used during the day. Light up on motion detection ONLY in low ambient light. Please ensure that the power adapter you are using supports DC 5V output to effectively charge the product. 9V or 12V charger is not compatible. Fast charging is not supported.The magnetic force on the stainless steel surface is not sufficient. You will need to use the provided metal strip for installation. In AUTO mode, please do not put two lights too close together, otherwise it may interfere with the work of one of the sensors. (As motion sensor can only be activated in dark environment, if one light turns on, the environment is too bright for the other one) It is recommended to space them at least one meter apart. If the received package is missing parts or if the motion sensor lights do not work, please let us know via Amazon message, we will make it right for you immediately!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly Workmanlike Lights
reviews.reviewText: These lights are great - inexpensive, not complicated to install, bright and with decent motion detection. We've used them in our pantry and under a cabinet - they give good bright light. The light is VERY white - which is great if you want to see something, but might not be ideal if you want a more nuanced illumination for your aesthetic. They charge quickly from USB and the charge lasts a long time. Overall, just a good light for general use and not expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lighting solution.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for above my door frame in my shared apartment foyer so I didn’t have to leave my light on the whole time I’m not home but could still see when I needed to unlock my door. Then I bought 8 more for under my kitchen cabinets and in the hallway leading to my front door/living room. It’s the perfect tone of light and awesome brightness and they shut off on their own after so many seconds so they don’t waste energy and I can just walk around my kitchen/hall without having to turn any lights on. Also bought two extra to keep charged for backup that I can just switch out when they start to die and need recharged. That seems to be working well because I always have working lights. I didn’t have electricity at all for 17 months right before I bought these and would just recharge things at work so these would have definitely worked well for that as charging them really doesn’t take that long and they’re small and attach and reattach with a magnet so they’re super easy to swap out and charge. Definitely recommend. Now that I have electricity again I still don’t use the lighting that is permanently installed in my apartment and these light my kitchen/hallway/and foyer fine. Sometimes the motion timer will shut off and you have to move around a little again to get them all to light up again but there is an always on option also and not just auto so if you needed them to stay on consistently that’s an option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price and a solid little rechargeable light
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 8”, 2 pack, for $12.76 and I have since purchased 3 more sets. I’m finding many uses for them and so far they are working very well. I will say that one of them, in a high traffic area, seems to need a charge every other day. That is the only one of the 8 that I have to behave this way.Some were charged fully out of the box and some needed a charge. No biggie for me.They’re bright and that’s what I need. I have two in closets, a few in the back of electronics racks, a couple under cabinets. All of them provide plenty of light for my needs and are a huge improvement over no lights.The motion detectors seem to function well. I have one, that same one that needs charging a lot, that seems a bit spotty but the rest are very good. It may be that there is too much light in that room during the day.The metal bar that comes with it is thin and very bendable but the adhesive seems highly effective and the thinness of bar is nice once it’s mounted as it is hardly noticeable.So far so great. Might even pick up some more if they stay this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient attaching to metal surfaces ... Perfect for use in closet/under kitchen cabinets.
reviews.reviewText: The package came with two lights. I used one in the closet, and that worked fine. The other one, I installed under a kitchen cabinet. Good lighting at night especially the motion sensing feature but you need to be closer than 4-ft and no ambient light to work. Overall good value buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One unit works well while the second light will not charge.
reviews.reviewText: Nice product that provides ample lighting in a closet area. Unfortunately one unit malfunctions from day one. Will not activate, no motion sensing, no always on as a hand held light. Charging doesn’t help as it never gets to a green light state. In fact when charging there is no red light either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable cabinet under lights!
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t be happier with the simplicity, functionality and affordability. These lights exceeded my expectations by a long shot. Way cheaper than hiring an electrician to pull wires and install devices. These appear to be well made, easy to charge, bright, and the motion detection works as soon as we walk into the kitchen at night & follow us around the room then shut off quickly!I hope they last

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased magnetic sensor lights, and I'm thoroughly impressed! The magnetic feature makes installation a breeze, and the sensor's responsiveness is spot-on. These lights provide a perfect blend of convenience and efficiency, illuminating spaces effortlessly. Highly recommended for anyone looking to enhance their home's lighting with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars IT STARTED OFF GOOD.... THEN.... (had to update and change my review)
reviews.reviewText: These lights first off are affordable. For a 2 Pack, Rechargeable, Motion detecting light set, I feel like it can't be beat! I hung mine in my pantry as the pantry doesn't have a light. I wasnworried the door may cause the light to stay on longer than it should when closing the pantry, but it does not stay on long so I think these should hold charge for a while becsude they shut off pretty quick one they are not needed. I do have mine set to Automatic.Be careful as they will slide pretty easily on the sticky mount, not by themselves, but I was changing the setting from Auto and it slid right on the side, stayed on the magnetic bar, but it was a close call. So put them somewhere you do not have to fool with the setting and let them chill where they are at.The lights are bright as well and do the job. I am satisfied with this purchase.****** Update:November 30, I noticed the light stopped working. I charged the light thinking it died after being hung up for so long, but it did not revocer from its malfunction. No matter how you flip the switch, "on/auto" the light comes on for literally a second then goes off. When you click another setting to make it react it does nothing at all. Motion is not being detected, and the light "on" doesn't stay on. I'll be sending these back if that's an option. I waited on the review to see if it would fix itself, but its over. The light won't work anymore. You get a good couple of weeks, then nothing. Cheap buy, worked well when it did, but both annoying and useless when it doesn't. I now have a light that won't light, and the rechargeable factor is void if there's nothing to light. What am I recharging hope?
